General.Name: ÜSTRA Hannoversche Verkehrsbetriebe Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: ÜSTRA Hannoversche Verkehrsbetriebe Aktiengesellschaft operates as a transport company in Germany. The company operates city bus and light rail line network. The company was founded in 1892 and is based in Hanover, Germany.

0.Name: Elke Maria Van Zadel
0.Title: Chairwoman for IT, Technology, Infrastructure & Marketing

1.Title: Member of Management Board and Board Member for Operations & HR
